name: VValkabout
description:
Use the three controls: left, forward, and right; explore all the places, and maybe you'll find the things before the Hunter finds you.

An early game I made and recently touched up, as a proof of concept for making a first-person, 3D-ish game using Twine: Sugarcube.

If you need a hint, here is a checklist of what you must do before you can find the object of your search:

Show checklist
  • look left and right in the dark
  • climb on the machine in the back
  • look down from the tower

Then you can look in the various places you have gone and you may find the things. After you find them, in order to leave, go back to where you came in and go forward into the "inserter". If you need another hint after you've done the checklist:

Show hintGo clockwise.

You only lose time when you move, or when 15 seconds pass before you move again, so if you leave the game running your time won't continue to run out.

You can support the game-maker and his more advanced works on Patreon.com if you like.

Your servant,
Patrick
